attributes.action: Deport all criminal refugees and Migrants. Ignore international law
attributes.background:
Migrants & refugees committing crimes in the UK do not have a right to remain. A threat to the safety of our citizens takes priority over their safety! Protect your people first. That is your duty.
Fail in your responsibility under the social contract and the law no longer applies to UK citizens.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
